ygData.subject: Re: Out gunned
ygData.msgSnippet: ... exactly, you are level 27...the cleric is a spell level ahead of you, and that wraith has a much higher mana usage and regen time than our lvl 29 DDs...
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 25 Sep 1999, Gregory Egan wrote:
> I thought wizards were supposed to be masters of DD spells. I was with a
> level 29 cleric recently, and he has a spell (wrath) which was doing 198
> damage to my 178. Granted, I am level 27, but was still kind of shocked. It

exactly, you are level 27...the cleric is a spell level ahead of you, and
that wraith has a much higher mana usage and regen time than our lvl 29
DDs...

Stannis Starslyder
Wizard of the Moon
Innoruuk
